Title: Clear Patrol - Bandits
Descriptions: Some bandits have made camp up at Devils Castle and have been shooting up the nearby towns. They need to be dealt with.
Head up to Devils Castle and clear out the bandits. They are a small group but they are well armed and dangerous. Be careful.
Nice work, we could use more people like you. Here is your reward.
ObjectiveText: Kill all units of the bandit patrol group at the marked location.
